channel.title: Error [HYPERION]
channel.description: When i complie i get this [code]src\org\hyperion\util\XStreamUtil.java:3: package com.thoughtworks.xstream does not exist import com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream; ^ src\org\hyperion\util\XStreamUtil.java:14: cannot find symbol symbol : class XStream location: class org.hyperion.util.XStreamUtil private static XStream xstream = null; ^ src\org\hyperion\util\XStreamUtil.java:16: cannot find symbol symbol : class XStream location: class org.hyperion.util.XStreamUtil public static XStream getXStream() { ^ src\org\hyperion\util\XStreamUtil.java:18: cannot find symbol symbol : class XStream location: class org.hyperion.util.XStreamUtil xstream = new XStream(); ^ 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

You have to add the XStream library to your classpath.
